name: Halloween Carved Pumpkin Zombie Sniper 3D!
description:
Halloween is not only funny time of tricks or treats, Halloween parties with costumes and decorations but also terrifying atmosphere full of scary creatures like witches, ghosts, Dracula vampires, werewolf devils. All those monsters warden in hunted houses, creepy graveyards , abandoned locations, dark forests waiting for you. This app focuses on most horrible apocalypse scenario where pumpkin zombies rises from the dead because of pumpkin skeleton king that got back his graveyard thorn and demands the abandoned castle - definitely it is not suitable for little kids or scared girls .Your mission is not to let pumpkin zombies in. In this professional 3D first person shooting sniper game bullets perfectly aims carved pumpkin heads and ghoul bodies. If you do not like violence or you are afraid of blood, zombies and graves do not install this game. If you are already become USA Professional Sniper and you are ready for real Halloween apocalypse you surely should. The time is now and zombies are coming out from graves. Because of your long hours of training Shoot them with great precision. Stay brave, focused and have fun during this Halloween.


Credits:
